title: Bug 11863: Update Test Suite action does not allow removal
OB: When executing the 'Update' action for a Test Suite, it does not provide an option to remove the existing content.
EB: The 'Update' action should display the current contents of the Test Suite and allow for modifications. A more appropriate solution would be to rename the action and the associated dialog to 'Recreate Test Suite'.
SR: To reproduce, perform an 'Update' action on a Test Suite that already contains content X.
